artist: Toyohara  Chikanobu; Published by Fukuda Hatsujirō
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: triptych, assembled, folded, and mounted in album: male figure at center wrestling a very large crane, while a falcon sits on the disabled bird's legs; three men at R rush from mounds of thatched bales to assist; other cranes flying off in background
marks: Signature, Title, and Seals LRC: Yo_shu_ Kunichika | Title URQ
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Catching a Crane
